<title level="1" right="Action">[Thoughtful Reload](/Actions.aspx?ID=922) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 140</row>

</column>

---

As you sink deep into a state of analytical calm and focus on the foe before you, your hands reload a bullet instinctively. Attempt a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) check against an opponent you can see and then Interact to reload.
name: Thoughtful Reload
